Key Match Events: Tylor Megill walked Trea Turner and Bryce Harper, and Nick Castellanos lined a hanging slider down the left field line for a single to win the game.
Mark Vientos hit two home runs and a double, becoming the youngest player in National League history to have three extra-base hits in a postseason game.
Bryce Harper hit a no-doubter home run after Luis Severino had struck him out twice.
Bryce Harper hit a home run off lefty-hitting Bryson Stott after Edwin Diaz got a 3-2 count.
Post-Match Reflections: Nick Castellanos had three big hits, including the game-tying home run and the walk-off single in the ninth.
Miscellaneous Highlights: A TWO-RUN SHOT FOR MARK VIENTOS!
